脑洞很重要

If you don't own this game yet, please, and i'll say it again. PLEASE, buy this game. This is a perfected video game that is still enjoyable almost 6-7 years after it's release.

I have never played a puzzle game as amazing as this. This is a perfect game. Puzzles are done brilliantly, and i've done so many playthroughs of this game back in the day on the 360.

The gameplay and story elements they have implemented into this amazing game have changed video gaming/puzzle-solving in a lot of ways that has changed the way other games think about puzzles, and the Portal series has been made a building block into modern puzzle games that build off of this genre.

To be experiencing such an amazing story is a treat to any gamer, and if you haven't played this game.

I'll say this again, please buy this game. It's something else and ascends from modern gaming/puzzle-solving as a whole.

10/10 I would honestly buy this so many times again and again.
this is the best game that i have never played
oyun çok güzel

[H1]Об игре[/h1]
Очень хорошая игра как для двоих,так и для одного в которой надо думать,а не просто стрелять в друг друга
Хотя здесь можно заставить твоего напарника побомбить мешая ему пройти уровень ;3
Можно создавать как свои локации,так и играть в локации из мастерской
Сюжет тоже интересный как в одиночной так и в кооперативной игре
Я не особо вникал в сюжет,но кооп здесь топ

[H1]Моё мнение[/h1]
Игру советую всем,с другом очень интересно играть и по ходу игры вы повысите своё довериу друг к другу,или же розненсете его в прах хд

Secuela de un juego que ya de por sí era perfecto.
Profundiza un poco mas en la trama y los personajes, amplía conceptos jugables y se nota que grafica y artisticamente ha cambiado bastante
Su mayor problema es que el primero era redondo, y no necesitaba una secuela, por lo que se siente como "portal otra vez".
pero eso es quejarme por quejarme, si tienes steam es casi obligación jugarlo

really amazing game

Gran juego para un solo jugador y cooperativo. Una gran continuación a la historia de Portal y un gran diseño de niveles que te saca de pasillos encerrados y casi laberínticos a grandes salas o epacios muy amplios. El toque de deterioro le da un buen sabor ya que vemos una aperture vieja y desgastada. Podremos ver a aperture desde otro punto de vista y como no... a nuestra querida Glados. Sin duda un gran juego :D
Сначала сломай свой мозг,а после взорви остатки

Benim ve inanıyorum ki bir çok kişinin en çok sevdiği oyun türü. Oyun, bulmacaları çözerek kaçmaya yönelik bir oyun. Bulmacaları çözmek için biraz da olsa sabır gerekiyor oyunun hikaye kısmını 10 saatte tamamen bitirdim. Ayrıca Multiplayer versiyonuyla arkadaş çevreniz varsa oynayabileciğiniz bir oyun.
